Computer graphics play a crucial role in various fields, ranging from entertainment and gaming to scientific visualization and design. item.title: Web Technology Questions And It`s solutions For Exam
item.description: Web Technology Questions And It`s solutions For Exam My Source ðŸ“– For Questions I`m using THIS Q1. Explain Head section of HTML with the help of suitable example. The <head> section of an HTML document contains metadata and other information about the HTML document, but it is not displayed on the actual webpage. It typically includes elements like the document title, links to stylesheets or scripts, character encoding, and more. Here’s an example of how the <head> section is structured:

item.title: Some Important Question And Its Solution for DBMS Exam
item.description: Some Important Question And Its Solution for DBMS Exam My Source ðŸ“– For Questions I`m using THIS Q1. What is Data Base Management System? Explain with its Applications. DBMS stands for Database Management System. It is a software system that enables users to create, store, organize, and manage vast amounts of data efficiently and effectively. DBMS provides an interface for interacting with databases and handles tasks such as data storage, retrieval, modification, and deletion.
